contenido: Flint: If you skip a fast-food hamburger, saving on its processing energy equals about 20 miles' worth of car fuel and 17 showers' worth of water, environmentalists claim. Raising animals for food accounts for over one-third of U.S. raw materials and fossil fuels, according to animal rights activists. For 13 years, Meriam Corcoran has been a vegan, vegetarian who avoids using any products derived from animals. Corcoran is a founding member of Veggies In Motion, a Detroit group promoting plant-based nutrition.
